the 25 sts from the stitch holder onto us1 circular needles or dpns if desired as evenly as possible 12 sts on one needle and 13 sts on the other circular needle ~ attach cc3 work the following rounds round 1 *k1 x p1* repeat 12 times k1 pick up and purl the stitch where the thumb meets the hand ~ there are now 26 sts round 2 *k1 x p1* repeat 13 times ~ repeat round 2 a total of 6 times ~ cast off
